title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Working on a secret project might bring immense satisfaction and fuel the incentive to do more. The stealthy Scorpio New Moon lands in your 3rd House of Communication, inspiring a fresh start to an endeavor you intentionally kept off everyone elses radar. Whether youre too anxious to reveal your news or you think others wont be interested, just follow your instincts rather than your logic today. Although this pet idea is yours, you could lose some ownership in it once its openly discussed. Revel in developing something special that belongs just to you until you feel ready to share it. Sometimes, those who fly solo have the strongest wings. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
